pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculates Whisker Odds // Descriptive statistics for large data tend to be low resolution on the tails. Whisker Odds generate a table of descriptive statistics for large data. This is the same as letter-values, but with an alternative naming of depths which allow for depths beyond 26. For a reference to letter- values see 'Heike Hofmann' and 'Hadley Wickham' and 'Karen Kafadar' (2017) doi:10.1080/10618600.2017.1305277.
